page.title: 07POEM *** MATH ***
page.content: Maybe 2 squared Maybe times 'pi' If I do much more I think I'll die! Maybe it's a graph Maybe it's a set Perhaps it's become some sort of bet. Maybe it's area, Maybe it's binary, Maybe a calculator in all its finery Maybe 4 cubed Maybe 5 litres What is the charge on parking meters? Maybe equations, Maybe angles What is the area of these bangles? Maybe a fraction, Maybe a net I'm determined I'll finish this yet. Maybe an average, maybe a plan, This cylinder is a metal can All this Maths. is too good for me, I'll stick to plus, you'll see.
